Job Description: Job description     Responsibilities     Function and software development for ARAS solution development for embedded systems    Requirement analysis and technical coordination with TVS Team    Deep understanding of hardware and software related architectures    Engineer with ARAS (AD) and software development experience   SelfDriven, Flexible and result-oriented Team player    Deep knowledge of tools for ARAS development    Passion for two-wheeler industry products   Vehicle tests/evaluation     Requirements     Candidates must possess atleast a Engineering/equivalent.    Atleast 5 year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.    Preferably Middle Level/Management.
